title: Carrot Cake
directions: beat eggs and sugar well until fluffy
Next you need to get 1 and 1/3 cups of plain flour, 1 and 1/3 teaspoons cinnamon, nutmeg, bi-carb soda and baking flour and
sift cinnamon, nutmeg, bi-carb of soda, baking flour into mixture and combine
then add grated carrots, chopped walnuts and vanilla, mix it all up and it is done.
Cook this mixture in 2 loaf tins at 170 fan forced - for about 30 minutes depends on your oven but you can't kill it, You will smell it.
To ice the cake, mix all of the ingredients together well
